- Automatically updates config with new key
- Revokes old key after successful update
- Atomic operation (rollback if new key creation fails)
- Confirmation prompt before rotating
- Shows old and new key prefixes
- Success message with new key info
- Option to keep old key with --keep-old flag
- Example in help text
